author: Conan O'Brien
text: If you work really hard, and you're kind, amazing things will happen.

author: Oliver Bowden
text: While I thought that I was learning how to live, I have been learning how to die.

author: Nayyirah Waheed
text: all the women. in me. are tired.

author: Chuck Klosterman
text: It's easier to believe there's a monster under the bed if you've spent the last six months arguing with a monster.
